verses.esv: 27 Religion that is pure and undefiled before God the Father is this: to visit orphans and widows in their affliction, and to keep oneself unstained from the world.
verses.kjv: 27 Pure religion and undefiled before God and the Father is this, To visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction, and to keep himself unspotted from the world.
verses.niv: 27 Religion that God our Father accepts as pure and faultless is this: to look after orphans and widows in their distress and to keep oneself from being polluted by the world.

verses.esv: 8 But if anyone does not provide for his relatives, and especially for members of his household, he has denied the faith and is worse than an unbeliever.
verses.kjv: 8 But if any provide not for his own, and specially for those of his own house, he hath denied the faith, and is worse than an infidel.
verses.niv: 8 If anyone does not provide for his relatives, and especially for his immediate family, he has denied the faith and is worse than an unbeliever.

verses.esv:
5   Father of the fatherless and protector of widows
    is God in his holy habitation.
verses.kjv: 5 A father of the fatherless, and a judge of the widows, is God in his holy habitation.
verses.niv: 5 A father to the fatherless, a defender of widows, is God in his holy dwelling.

verses.esv: 4 Fathers, do not provoke your children to anger, but bring them up in the discipline and instruction of the Lord.
verses.kjv: 4 And, ye fathers, provoke not your children to wrath: but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord.
verses.niv: 4 Fathers, do not exasperate your children; instead, bring them up in the training and instruction of the Lord.

verses.esv: 18 He executes justice for the fatherless and the widow, and loves the sojourner, giving him food and clothing.
verses.kjv: 18 He doth execute the judgment of the fatherless and widow, and loveth the stranger, in giving him food and raiment.
verses.niv: 18 He defends the cause of the fatherless and the widow, and loves the alien, giving him food and clothing.

verses.esv:
5   Father of the fatherless and protector of widows
    is God in his holy habitation.
6   God settles the solitary in a home;
    he leads out the prisoners to prosperity,
    but the rebellious dwell in a parched land.
verses.kjv: 5 A father of the fatherless, and a judge of the widows, is God in his holy habitation. 6 God setteth the solitary in families: he bringeth out those which are bound with chains: but the rebellious dwell in a dry land.
verses.niv: 5 A father to the fatherless, a defender of widows, is God in his holy dwelling. 6 God sets the lonely in families, he leads forth the prisoners with singing; but the rebellious live in a sun-scorched land.

verses.esv:
3   Give justice to the weak and the fatherless;
    maintain the right of the afflicted and the destitute.
verses.kjv: 3 Defend the poor and fatherless: do justice to the afflicted and needy.
verses.niv: 3 Defend the cause of the weak and fatherless; maintain the rights of the poor and oppressed.

verses.esv:
10   For my father and my mother have forsaken me,
    but the LORD will take me in.
verses.kjv: 10 When my father and my mother forsake me, then the LORD will take me up.
verses.niv: 10 Though my father and mother forsake me, the LORD will receive me.

verses.esv:
14   But you do see, for you note mischief and vexation,
    that you may take it into your hands;
  to you the helpless commits himself;
    you have been the helper of the fatherless.
verses.kjv: 14 Thou hast seen it; for thou beholdest mischief and spite, to requite it with thy hand: the poor committeth himself unto thee; thou art the helper of the fatherless.
verses.niv: 14 But you, O God, do see trouble and grief; you consider it to take it in hand. The victim commits himself to you; you are the helper of the fatherless.

verses.esv:
18   to do justice to the fatherless and the oppressed,
    so that man who is of the earth may strike terror no more.
verses.kjv: 18 To judge the fatherless and the oppressed, that the man of the earth may no more oppress.
verses.niv: 18 defending the fatherless and the oppressed, in order that man, who is of the earth, may terrify no more.

verses.esv:
6   Train up a child in the way he should go;
    even when he is old he will not depart from it.
verses.kjv: 6 Train up a child in the way he should go: and when he is old, he will not depart from it.
verses.niv: 6 Train a child in the way he should go, and when he is old he will not turn from it.

verses.esv:
11   Leave your fatherless children; I will keep them alive;
    and let your widows trust in me.”
verses.kjv: 11 Leave thy fatherless children, I will preserve them alive; and let thy widows trust in me.
verses.niv: 11 Leave your orphans; I will protect their lives. Your widows too can trust in me."

verses.esv: 18 “I will not leave you as orphans; I will come to you.
verses.kjv: 18 I will not leave you comfortless: I will come to you.
verses.niv: 18 I will not leave you as orphans; I will come to you.

verses.esv:
9   The LORD watches over the sojourners;
    he upholds the widow and the fatherless,
    but the way of the wicked he brings to ruin.
verses.kjv: 9 The LORD preserveth the strangers; he relieveth the fatherless and widow: but the way of the wicked he turneth upside down.
verses.niv: 9 The LORD watches over the alien and sustains the fatherless and the widow, but he frustrates the ways of the wicked.

verses.esv: 16 “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
verses.kjv: 16 For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.niv: 16 "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

verses.esv:
13   As a father shows compassion to his children,
    so the LORD shows compassion to those who fear him.
verses.kjv: 13 Like as a father pitieth his children, so the LORD pitieth them that fear him.
verses.niv: 13 As a father has compassion on his children, so the LORD has compassion on those who fear him;

verses.esv:
23   Your princes are rebels
    and companions of thieves.
  Everyone loves a bribe
    and runs after gifts.
  They do not bring justice to the fatherless,
    and the widow’s cause does not come to them.
verses.kjv: 23 Thy princes are rebellious, and companions of thieves: every one loveth gifts, and followeth after rewards: they judge not the fatherless, neither doth the cause of the widow come unto them.
verses.niv: 23 Your rulers are rebels, companions of thieves; they all love bribes and chase after gifts. They do not defend the cause of the fatherless; the widow's case does not come before them.

verses.esv:
6   They kill the widow and the sojourner,
    and murder the fatherless;
verses.kjv: 6 They slay the widow and the stranger, and murder the fatherless.
verses.niv: 6 They slay the widow and the alien; they murder the fatherless.

verses.esv:
17     learn to do good;
  seek justice,
    correct oppression;
  bring justice to the fatherless,
    plead the widow’s cause.
verses.kjv: 17 Learn to do well; seek judgment, relieve the oppressed, judge the fatherless, plead for the widow.
verses.niv: 17 learn to do right! Seek justice, encourage the oppressed. Defend the cause of the fatherless, plead the case of the widow.

verses.esv: 14 if my people who are called by my name humble themselves, and pray and seek my face and turn from their wicked ways, then I will hear from heaven and will forgive their sin and heal their land.
verses.kjv: 14 If my people, which are called by my name, shall humble themselves, and pray, and seek my face, and turn from their wicked ways; then will I hear from heaven, and will forgive their sin, and will heal their land.
verses.niv: 14 if my people, who are called by my name, will humble themselves and pray and seek my face and turn from their wicked ways, then will I hear from heaven and will forgive their sin and will heal their land.

verses.esv:
27   You would even cast lots over the fatherless,
    and bargain over your friend.
verses.kjv: 27 Yea, ye overwhelm the fatherless, and ye dig a pit for your friend.
verses.niv: 27 You would even cast lots for the fatherless and barter away your friend.

verses.esv:
24   Whoever spares the rod hates his son,
    but he who loves him is diligent to discipline him.
verses.kjv: 24 He that spareth his rod hateth his son: but he that loveth him chasteneth him betimes.
verses.niv: 24 He who spares the rod hates his son, but he who loves him is careful to discipline him.

verses.esv:
12   because I delivered the poor who cried for help,
    and the fatherless who had none to help him.
verses.kjv: 12 Because I delivered the poor that cried, and the fatherless, and him that had none to help him.
verses.niv: 12 because I rescued the poor who cried for help, and the fatherless who had none to assist him.

verses.esv: 20 Behold, I stand at the door and knock. If anyone hears my voice and opens the door, I will come in to him and eat with him, and he with me.
verses.kjv: 20 Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: if any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him, and will sup with him, and he with me.
verses.niv: 20 Here I am! I stand at the door and knock. If anyone hears my voice and opens the door, I will come in and eat with him, and he with me.

verses.esv: 19 “‘Cursed be anyone who perverts the justice due to the sojourner, the fatherless, and the widow.’ And all the people shall say, ‘Amen.’
verses.kjv: 19 Cursed be he that perverteth the judgment of the stranger, fatherless, and widow. And all the people shall say, Amen.
verses.niv: 19 "Cursed is the man who withholds justice from the alien, the fatherless or the widow." Then all the people shall say, "Amen!"
